txt.en: 'If we can prove that Dravron has been attempting to cheat on his taxes, we can turn the situation to our advantage.'
You have returned to Ethring with Dervorin.\n\nTalk to Dervorin.
It is time to confront Dravron.
'If you are prepared, we should leave now.'
'Dravron is in custody, as are the brigands in his employ. Hopefully this spells the end of this sordid affair.'
Dervorin is going to confront Dravron over his taxes, or lack thereof.\n\nTalk to him when you're ready to accompany him.
